title: Why has the claimed dark matter discovery sparked debate, caution?
description: Physicists don’t know what dark matter is made up of, but one hypothesis is it’s made of a new type of subatomic particle called WIMPs. According to physicists, WIMPs barely interact with normal matter and not at all with light. The trick to finding them then is the high-energy particles released when two WIMPs annihilate each other

title: Meet Amandeep Singh Bola; PIO who ran towards Bondi bullets, pounced on shooter
description: A Punjabi-Sikh New Zealander, Amandeep Singh Bola, displayed remarkable bravery during the Bondi beach shooting. While enjoying a kebab, he heard gunshots and instinctively ran towards the danger. Bola tackled one of the gunmen, disarmed him, and held him down until police arrived, embodying the spirit of multiculturalism amidst chaos.

title: Drugs, parties, penalties: B'luru apartment body booked for running parallel justice system
description: Police in Bengaluru have launched a criminal probe into an apartment association and a security firm. They allegedly ran an illegal system, imposing penalties for drug possession and late-night parties. This system suppressed serious crimes, denying justice to victims. The association collected over Rs 3.3 lakh in fines. Police are investigating the deliberate cover-up of offenses.

description: Silent Hill Townfall, a highly anticipated collaboration, may be closer than expected. While details remain scarce, the game promises deep psychological horror, aligning with the studio's past work and the franchise's resurgence.

title: Gisele Bündchen spotted jet skiing in Florida with Joaquim Valente amid Tom Brady buzz
description: Gisele Bündchen and Joaquim Valente embraced a sun-drenched holiday with a jet ski outing near their Florida home, prioritizing family and privacy after welcoming their son. This choice reflects Bündchen's current focus on grounding moments and personal strength over public spectacle. Meanwhile, Tom Brady confirmed his NFL retirement is permanent due to his ownership stake in the Raiders.
